displaytitle: Virgin and Child with Angels, Saint Anthony, and Donor
creditline: Gift of Henry White Cannon Jr., Class of 1910, in memory of his Father

titles.title: Virgin and Child with Angels, Saint Anthony, and Donor

texts.textentryhtml: Count Luigi Balladoro (?-?), Verona; Purchased from him by Jean Paul Richter (1847-1937) in Verona in March 1888 (for frs. 2,700); Purchased from him by Henry White Cannon (1850-1934) in Florence on March 19, 1906; By descent to his son, Henry (Harry) W. Cannon, Jr. (1887-1966), Class of 1910; Donated to the Museum in 1935.

caption: Francesco Torbido (Italian, c. 1482-85–after 1562), Virgin and Child with Angels, Saint Anthony, and Donor. Oil on canvas; 81.3 x 117 cm, 113 x 146.7 x 11.4 cm (frame). Gift of Henry White Cannon Jr., Class of 1910, in memory of his Father (y1935-36)
